original: @83b rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @83b rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya manydzu sh'ri ku m'a ra bh'u t'ashtotta ra sha ta ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
analyzed: a'arya manydzu sh'ri ku m'a ra bh'u t'ashtotta ra sha ta ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
translated: Ārya-Mañjuśrī-kumārabhūta-aṣṭottara-śataka-nāma-dhāraṇī-mantrasaṃhitā.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /🔽phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i @84a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa / phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i @84a *//
translated: The Noble One Hundred and Eight Names of Mañjuśrī, the Youthful, with Dhāraṇī and Mantra.🔽To the perfect buddhas of the ten directions, who pervade all knowable objects without exception and possess the supreme and wondrous pure mind,

original: rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage.

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa /
translated: To Mañjuśrī, the youthful one,

original: thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba; yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku /
analyzed: thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba; yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku /
translated: whose mind is free from all stains and faults, whose body is adorned with the light rays of the assembly of stainless qualities,

original: zhabs rten gyi padma la lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: zhabs rten gyi padma la lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: At the lotus feet, the crowns and topknots of gods, humans, demigods, nāgas, and vidyādharas touch the tips of the lotus feet. Homage!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mañjughoṣa, the destroyer of various lower realms.

original: tadya th'a / aom bho ma h'a ma ni ru tsi ra ka l'a pa bi tsi tra /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom bho ma h'a ma ni ru tsi ra ka l'a pa bi tsi tra /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ bhoma mahā maṇirucīra kalāpa vicitra

analyzed: mukta d'a ma /

analyzed: aa lam kri ta sha r'a ra /

analyzed: pra ba ra dharma /

analyzed: sa manta a'a ka ra /

analyzed: manta pra sa ra /

analyzed: sa ra sa ra / he he manydzu ra ba /

analyzed: tstshi tstshi bhinda /

analyzed: bi ra dza bi ra ja /

original: na da na da /

original: sa ra sa ra /

original: ma h'a bo dhi sa tva /
analyzed: ma h'a bo dhi sa tva /

original: ma nu sri ta /
analyzed: ma nu sri ta /

analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka //

analyzed: au pa dru to nyahanm/

analyzed: aa bi bikto nya ham/

analyzed: ku s'i dho nyaham/

analyzed: me ra na dharmo nyaham/

analyzed: tam bha ga w'a na /

analyzed: du: khi ta n'am/

analyzed: su kham da d'a /

analyzed: aa n'a th'a n'am/ sa n'a th'a ka ra /

original: sa ra dza sam/
analyzed: sa ra dza sam/

original: b'a ra dza ska ra /
analyzed: b'a ra dza ska ra /

original: au pa dru t'a n'am/
analyzed: au pa dru t'a n'am/

original: sva ro pa dra ba /
analyzed: sva ro pa dra ba /

original: pra sha ma ka /
analyzed: pra sha ma ka /

original: sa bi bi ga t'a n'am/
analyzed: sa bi bi ga t'a n'am/

original: ku sha la sambha ra /
analyzed: ku sha la sambha ra /

original: pa ri pu ra yi t'a /
analyzed: pa ri pu ra yi t'a /

original: ku si dh'a n'am/🔽ma h'a b'irya dah ta /🔽ma ra na dha rmi na /
analyzed: ku si dh'a n'am/ ma h'a b'irya dah ta / ma ra na dha rmi na /

original: ma mi ta pa d'a d'a t'a /
analyzed: ma mi ta pa d'a d'a t'a /

original: mama bi bha ga w'a na /
analyzed: mama bi bha ga w'a na /

original: n'a tho bha ba; sha ra n'am/
analyzed: n'a tho bha ba; sha ra n'am/

original: pa ra y'a n'am/
analyzed: pa ra y'a n'am/

original: tra t'a / sarba du: kh'a ni me pra sha ma ya /
analyzed: tra t'a / sarba du: kh'a ni me pra sha ma ya /

analyzed: sa rba kla sha ra dzi si mi /

original: aa ba na ye /
analyzed: aa ba na ye /
translated: Avana ye.

analyzed: sarba sam sva ro ba drab /

original: du: kha ni me /
analyzed: du: kha ni me /

original: n'a sha ya /
analyzed: n'a sha ya /
translated: Nāśaya.

original: sarba ku sha la /
analyzed: sarba ku sha la /
translated: Sarva kuśala.

original: dharma pa ri pu ra me ku ru /
analyzed: dharma pa ri pu ra me ku ru /

original: sarba karma a'a ba ra na /
analyzed: sarba karma a'a ba ra na /
translated: Sarva karma avaran.

original: kle sha pa ra t'a me bi ka ri //
analyzed: kle sha pa ra t'a me bi ka ri //

original: ma h'a bo dhi sa tva si bi dhi /
analyzed: ma h'a bo dhi sa tva si bi dhi /

original: b'i rya p'a ra i t'a /
analyzed: b'i rya p'a ra i t'a /

original: yo gamme sanni yo dza ya /
analyzed: yo gamme sanni yo dza ya /

analyzed: a'a ba ra na dha rma bi r'a ga bi ra dza /

analyzed: sanytsa ha / pra dza ha /

analyzed: dha ri ni / sa ma kha sa ma /
translated: dhāriṇi🔽samasama

original: dza la ni dhi sa ma /
analyzed: dza la ni dhi sa ma /
translated: jalani dhi sama

original: me ru sa ma /
analyzed: me ru sa ma /
translated: meru sama

original: ma h'a bo dhi sa tva pa ra da s'va h'a /
analyzed: ma h'a bo dhi sa tva pa ra da s'va h'a /
translated: mahābodhisattva parādasva ha

original: rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di //
analyzed: rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di //
translated: This knowledge mantra, which accomplishes all aims,🔽Was explained by Mañjughoṣa.

original: @85a *// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na //🔽de ma thag tu sems can rnams //
analyzed: @85a *// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na // de ma thag tu sems can rnams //
translated: Immediately after it was explained,

original: skye dang rga ba zad par gyur //
analyzed: skye dang rga ba zad par gyur //
translated: Sentient beings’ birth and aging came to an end.🔽All the lower realms were pacified,

original: ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas; ;bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar //
analyzed: ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas; ;bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar //
translated: And the hordes of Māra trembled.

original: lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'//
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'//
translated: All the gods were overjoyed,

original: log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 'gyur //🔽sdig pa zhi ba byed pa yi //
analyzed: log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 'gyur // sdig pa zhi ba byed pa yi //
translated: And the misleaders were terrified.🔽As soon as this dhāraṇī

original: gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang //
analyzed: gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang //
translated: That pacifies evil was explained,

original: grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed //
analyzed: grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed //
translated: An incalculable, hundred-thousand-billion

original: 'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar //
translated: Number of beings were freed from the prison of saṃsāra.

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis //
translated: The youthful Mañjuśrī

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing //
translated: And Mañjughoṣa was well accomplished.

original: gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na //
analyzed: gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na //
translated: When the knowledge-mantra was explained,

original: brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas //
analyzed: brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas //
translated: The earth with its rocks, forests, and groves

original: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i //
translated: And the moving and unmoving

original: sa gzhi de yi tshe na g-yos //🔽sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis //
analyzed: sa gzhi de yi tshe na g-yos // sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis //
translated: Began to shake at that time.🔽The earth’s surface was pervaded

original: sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur //
analyzed: sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur //
translated: By the light of the Buddha.🔽All the obstructors, the misleaders,

original: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams //🔽stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes //
analyzed: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams // stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes //
translated: And the rākṣasas of terrible forms🔽Uttered the words in unison:

original: skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smra //
analyzed: skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smra //
translated: “Homage to the one with ten powers!”

original: lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can //
analyzed: lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can //
translated: The gods, with peaceful attire,

original: thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas //
analyzed: thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas //
translated: All delighted in mind,🔽Approached the place where the vajra sword was

original: gang na rdo rje ral gri cha; ;de yi drung lhags smras pa ni //
analyzed: gang na rdo rje ral gri cha; ;de yi drung lhags smras pa ni //
translated: And said:

original: phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /
translated: “Homage to the supreme vajra of generosity,

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la //
translated: To Mañjughoṣa of great strength,

original: shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can //
analyzed: shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can //
translated: The victorious one endowed with a thousand powers,

original: bgegs @85b kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa //
analyzed: bgegs @85b kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa //
translated: The one who utterly destroys the realm of obstructors.

original: sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang //
analyzed: sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang //
translated: The mantra-holder, the great mantra-holder,

original: sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /
translated: The multi-formed, the lord of men,

original: shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs //
analyzed: shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs //
translated: The very powerful, the beautiful-formed, the fearful,

original: drag po drag po rab 'joms pa //
analyzed: drag po drag po rab 'joms pa //
translated: The fierce one, the fierce one, the total conqueror,

original: gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal //
analyzed: gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal //
translated: The glorious one, the glorious one, the glorious one,

original: dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe //
analyzed: dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe //
translated: The glorious one, the incomparable example,

original: rdo rje can de snying sbyong ba //
analyzed: rdo rje can de snying sbyong ba //
translated: The vajra-holder, the one who purifies the heart,🔽The dispeller of the darkness of ignorance,

original: mi shes pa yi rab rib sel; ;sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba //
analyzed: mi shes pa yi rab rib sel; ;sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba //
translated: The one with the supreme charming attire,

original: skye rgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes //
analyzed: skye rgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes //
translated: The lord of beings, the one who delights in charm,

original: gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba //
analyzed: gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba //
translated: The one with long arms, the powerful archer,

original: nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad //
analyzed: nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad //
translated: The one who removes the afflictions and enemies,

original: mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol //
analyzed: mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol //
translated: The beautiful one, the one who wears various garments,

original: me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can //
analyzed: me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can //
translated: The one adorned with various flower garlands,

original: spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste //
analyzed: spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste //
translated: The one with beautiful eyes and a beautiful head,

original: dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol /
analyzed: dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol /
translated: The one who is delighted and wears beautiful garments,

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bzhad //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bzhad //
translated: The melodious one, the one who laughs joyfully,

original: dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba //
analyzed: dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba //
translated: The one with eyes that distinguish good and bad,

original: ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags //
translated: The one who proclaims the sound of ha ha,

original: rab tu dka' ba ston par dga'//
analyzed: rab tu dka' ba ston par dga'//
translated: He delights in teaching the most difficult.

original: rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan //
analyzed: rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan //
translated: He has the great ornament and the color of gold.

original: rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can //
translated: He has the domain of the essence of the ocean.

original: tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste //
analyzed: tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste //
translated: He knows the way, is endowed with the way, and is fearless.

original: sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad //
analyzed: sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad //
translated: He terrifies the hateful with his heart of fearlessness.

original: cha lugs sngo las skyong ba //
analyzed: cha lugs sngo las skyong ba //
translated: He is the protector of the blue-clad ones.

original: lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad //
analyzed: lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad //
translated: He delights the lord of the gods.

original: 'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel brtan //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel brtan //
translated: He is the god of desire, the stable one who removes desire.

original: rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa //
analyzed: rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa //
translated: He is the king, the holder of the earth of the world.

original: brtan po rnams la brtan par grags //
analyzed: brtan po rnams la brtan par grags //
translated: He is known as the stable one among the stable ones.

original: yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad //
analyzed: yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad //
translated: He is the one who laughs in the direction of good qualities.

original: @86a *// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa //
analyzed: @86a *// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa //
translated: He is the one who bows, the one who bows with folded hands.

original: rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags //🔽stobs po cha la shugs che ba //
analyzed: rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags // stobs po cha la shugs che ba //
translated: He is the one who is always worshipped and revered.🔽He is the one with great strength, the one with great power.

original: phyag ring g-yul chen mnga' ba po //
analyzed: phyag ring g-yul chen mnga' ba po //
translated: He is the one with long arms, the one with great battles.

original: sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste //
analyzed: sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste //
translated: He is the great hero, the one with the holy vajra.

original: 'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes //🔽dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog /
analyzed: 'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes // dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog /
translated: He is the one who knows shame, the one who protects with shame.🔽He is the supreme essence of the great maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor chen por ston pa po //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen por ston pa po //
translated: He is the one who reveals the great maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste //
translated: And the great maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags //
translated: You have performed the great maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can //
translated: You are the maṇḍala master with the maṇḍala,🔽Endowed with a retinue of attendants at your feet,

original: zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan; ;ha ha sv'a h'a'i bdag che ba //
analyzed: zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan; ;ha ha sv'a h'a'i bdag che ba //
translated: The great lord of Ha Ha Svaha,

original: mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam //
translated: The great offering equal to the earth.

original: h'um gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste //
analyzed: h'um gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste //
translated: With Hum you terrify and frighten,

original: 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po //
translated: The one who illuminates with fearful light,

original: lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud //
analyzed: lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud //
translated: Bowed to by gods and demigods,

original: de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis //
analyzed: de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis //
translated: Likewise worshipped and honored,

original: zham 'bring gad rgyangs chen po can //
analyzed: zham 'bring gad rgyangs chen po can //
translated: With a retinue of great laughter,

original: rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad //
analyzed: rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad //
translated: Clearing away the darkness with strong winds,

original: 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags //
translated: Renowned in the three worlds,

original: gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba //
analyzed: gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba //
translated: Served by yakṣas and rākṣasas,

original: drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba //
analyzed: drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba //
translated: The white-acting Rudra, the source of bliss,

original: mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can //
analyzed: mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can //
translated: The lord with the crest jewel,

original: 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod //
analyzed: 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod //
translated: Smiling and charming in all your conduct,

original: spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags //🔽nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa //
analyzed: spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags // nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa //
translated: Your conduct as stable as the earth.🔽The beautiful light of the maṇḍala of jewels,

original: nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba //
analyzed: nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba //
translated: The shining sun,

original: nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs @86b bzhin; ;tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhad //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs @86b bzhin; ;tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhad //
translated: he sits alone, shining forth.

original: mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad //
analyzed: mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad //
translated: He is delightful to behold, and brings joy.

original: nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin //🔽dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin ; ;gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa //
analyzed: nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin // dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin ; ;gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa //
translated: He gives wealth, and gives mantras,🔽gives power, gives kingdoms,🔽gives beauty, and gives strength.

original: dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri //
analyzed: dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri //
translated: He is glorious, makes glory, and overcomes obstacles.

original: kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad //
analyzed: kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad //
translated: He clears away all confusion.

original: 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa //🔽zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa // zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa //
translated: He comes to the assembly and sits on the seat.🔽He accumulates the offerings at his feet.

original: dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can //
analyzed: dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can //
translated: He has armlets, earrings, and anklets,

original: nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: and is adorned with jeweled ornaments.🔽He is the lamp for the world, moving and unmoving,

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron; ;rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron; ;rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po //
translated: the one who clears away darkness.

original: ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa //
analyzed: ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa //
translated: He is the teacher, the one who teaches, the protector,

original: dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /
analyzed: dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /
translated: the lord of the senses, the best of armies,

original: 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste //
translated: the one who clears away fear,

original: 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa //
translated: the one who gives the state of fearlessness.

original: dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba //
analyzed: dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba //
translated: He is white, blue, and has beautiful light.

original: mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags //
analyzed: mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags //
translated: And the teacher of the blue-throated one.

original: ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba //
translated: He is the one who tames those to be tamed,🔽And thus displays various forms.

original: de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston; ;shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad //
analyzed: de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston; ;shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad //
translated: He wields the sword of wisdom,

original: stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa //
analyzed: stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa //
translated: And upholds the Dharma of emptiness.

original: byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen //
analyzed: byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen //
translated: He knows the supreme and the inferior,

original: rnam par grags pa gsan pa des //🔽rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod //
analyzed: rnam par grags pa gsan pa des // rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod //
translated: And is renowned in all directions.🔽He is praised by the vidyādharas,🔽The powerful vidyādharas,

original: rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che //🔽shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los bsgyur //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che // shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los bsgyur //
translated: The great conquerors,

original: 'jigs med blo gros shes rab can //
analyzed: 'jigs med blo gros shes rab can //
translated: The fearless ones, the wise ones,

original: de @87a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: de @87a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa //
translated: The upholders of the Tathāgata’s Dharma,

original: mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste //
analyzed: mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste //
translated: The ones with beautiful voices, the peaceful ones,

original: zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa //
analyzed: zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa //
translated: The ones who teach the path of peace,

original: lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur //
analyzed: lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur //
translated: The ones revered by gods and asuras,

original: sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad //
translated: The ones who bring fearlessness to all beings,

original: sems can kun la rab ston pa //
analyzed: sems can kun la rab ston pa //
translated: The ones who teach to all beings,

original: brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /
analyzed: brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /
translated: The steadfast ones, the supreme ones among all beings,🔽The ones skilled in the minds of all beings,

original: sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas; ;sred med bu ste drag shul stobs //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas; ;sred med bu ste drag shul stobs //
translated: The ones like Nārāyaṇa, the powerful ones,

original: me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: Like the light of a fire,

original: byis pa'i sku mchog sbyin pa //
analyzed: byis pa'i sku mchog sbyin pa //
translated: The supreme body of a child,

original: rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad //
analyzed: rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad //
translated: Displaying play and games,

original: phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad //
analyzed: phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad //
translated: Performing mudras, performing secret mantras,

original: bdag gir mi mdzad rdul med brtan //
analyzed: bdag gir mi mdzad rdul med brtan //
translated: Not performing as one's own, dustless, stable,

original: mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa //
analyzed: mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa //
translated: Like space, incomparable, skilled in speech,

original: bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po //
analyzed: bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po //
translated: Defeating the army of Mara for sure,

original: mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med //
analyzed: mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med //
translated: The supreme human, striving, unshakable,

original: de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal //
translated: Likewise, unassailable, victorious,

original: brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Stable, Buddha, Tathagata,

original: mya ngan med cing gnas pa med //
analyzed: mya ngan med cing gnas pa med //
translated: Deathless, without abode,

original: 'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang //
analyzed: 'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang //
translated: Invincible, with good words, good attire,

original: dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'joms //
analyzed: dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'joms //
translated: A hero, conquering enemies,

original: tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa //
translated: A great being, definitely conquering yogis,

original: 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs //
analyzed: 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs //
translated: Subduing desires, going specially,

original: mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /
analyzed: mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /
translated: The protector, supreme son of the Victorious Ones,

original: gshin rje pham mdzad skye rgu srung //
analyzed: gshin rje pham mdzad skye rgu srung //
translated: Defeating Yama, protecting living beings,

original: las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa //
translated: Completely burning karma and afflictions,

original: ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags //
analyzed: ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags //
translated: The teacher, the one who clears away afflictions.

original: legs pa khyod @87b kyi mchog gi mtshan //
analyzed: legs pa khyod @87b kyi mchog gi mtshan //
translated: The one hundred and eight names of the supreme one,

original: brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing //
translated: Which are very clear,

original: dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di //
analyzed: dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di //
translated: And which generate faith,

original: lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad //
analyzed: lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad //
translated: Were explained by the supreme gods.🔽The great obstructors, the misleaders,🔽The yakṣas, asuras, rākṣasas,

original: bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang // mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis //
analyzed: bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang // mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis //
translated: The vitality-stealing thieves, and the goblins

original: de ring legs par bstod par gyur //
analyzed: de ring legs par bstod par gyur //
translated: Were all praised well today.

original: 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab //
analyzed: 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab //
translated: Mañjuvajra, the supreme one,

original: bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur //
analyzed: bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur //
translated: Was looked at with pride and became blissful.

original: de dag kun la bltas nas kyang //
analyzed: de dag kun la bltas nas kyang //
translated: Having looked at all of them,

original: 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa //
analyzed: 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa //
translated: He spoke these words:

original: khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing //
analyzed: khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing //
translated: “All of you, always be free from obstacles,

original: nges legs thar pa thob gyur la; ;'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /
analyzed: nges legs thar pa thob gyur la; ;'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /
translated: And attain the liberation of definite goodness.

original: nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /
analyzed: nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /
translated: Do not think of me as a fearsome one.”

original: de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing //🔽'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi //
analyzed: de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing // 'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi //
translated: Then, laughing very loudly,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas //
translated: The Tathāgata, with a clear face,🔽Made a sound like a great dragon's roar:🔽Listen, all you hosts of gods and spirits!

original: shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa //
translated: Looking to the east, he spoke:

original: kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul //
analyzed: kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul //
translated: “Ah! The supreme domain of secret mantra,

original: sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to dispel the ignorance of sentient beings,

original: sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs //
translated: The accumulation of merit of sentient beings

original: shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur //🔽kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'i //
analyzed: shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur // kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'i //
translated: Has become extremely vast.

original: sems can rnams ni rab spyad phyir //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni rab spyad phyir //
translated: Ah! For the sake of sentient beings with great merit,

original: dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs //
analyzed: dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs //
translated: The dhāraṇī of accomplishment, the sublime gift,

original: 'dzum pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad //
analyzed: 'dzum pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad //
translated: Is fully explained by the lightning of smiles.

original: la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas //
analyzed: la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas //
translated: Whoever, having entered meditative equipoise,🔽Recites this accomplished dhāraṇī

original: sdug bsngal thams cad sel @88a *//🔽ba yi // grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am //
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad sel @88a *// ba yi // grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am //
translated: That removes all suffering,

original: yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung //
analyzed: yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung //
translated: Or listens to it or contemplates it,

original: de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing //
translated: All their aims will be accomplished,

original: sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur //
translated: And they will be liberated from all suffering.

original: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa //
translated: All their negative actions will be purified,

original: de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: And they will certainly attain

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang //🔽ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang //🔽ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob //
translated: The great stage of the Tathāgatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis //
translated: The bodhisattvas

original: rab dga' shin tu dri ma med //
analyzed: rab dga' shin tu dri ma med //
translated: are in the stages of Perfect Joy, Stainless,

original: 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can //
analyzed: 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can //
translated: Radiant, Brilliance,🔽Difficult to Overcome, and likewise Manifested,

original: sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur; ;ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur; ;ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
translated: Gone Far, Immovable,

original: legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin //
translated: Excellent Wisdom, and Cloud of Dharma.

original: sa chen dam pa de dag kyang //
analyzed: sa chen dam pa de dag kyang //
translated: These are the great stages

original: gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi //
analyzed: gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi //
translated: of those who are firmly established

original: sems can chen pos mi thogs par //
analyzed: sems can chen pos mi thogs par //
translated: in the Great Vehicle.🔽They will attain them without delay

original: tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: when their lives come to an end.🔽They will attain unsurpassed enlightenment,🔽which is pure of all evil,🔽beloved by all beings,

original: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang // spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi //🔽byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang // spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi // byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur //
translated: and the pacification of all conceptual elaboration.🔽It gives rise to all vidyādhara-s

original: rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa //
translated: and pacifies all evil.

original: bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi //
analyzed: bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi //
translated: It is the most auspicious and virtuous

original: ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di //
analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di //
translated: of the one hundred and eight names.

original: sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas //
analyzed: sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas //
translated: With your ten fingers placed together in añjali

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la //
translated: and seated in front of Mañjughoṣa,

original: shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
translated: With a mind of utmost clarity,

original: nang bar langs nas su brjod pa //
analyzed: nang bar langs nas su brjod pa //
translated: Having arisen in the morning, one should recite:🔽All vidyādhara-s,

original: @88b de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang // de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams //
analyzed: @88b de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang // de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams //
translated: And likewise the lords of the gods,

original: gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /
analyzed: gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /
translated: Many yakṣa-s and rākṣasa-s,

original: rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed //
analyzed: rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed //
translated: Always protect him.🔽All the sons of the Tathāgata-s,🔽And the Tathāgata-s themselves,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams //
translated: And likewise those who wield the vajra weapon,

original: de la nges par srung bar byed //
analyzed: de la nges par srung bar byed //
translated: Certainly protect him.

original: de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing //
translated: He abides in the body of the Buddha,

original: mnyam par gzhag pa snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa snang bar 'gyur //
translated: And appears in meditative equipoise.

original: gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams //
analyzed: gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams //
translated: The lords of the yakṣa-s and gods,🔽The great obstructors and misleaders,

original: bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dang / dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi //
analyzed: bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dang / dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi //
translated: With a pure and virtuous mind,

original: rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal //
analyzed: rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal //
translated: Bow from afar.

original: de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas //
analyzed: de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas //
translated: Therefore, the obstructors, being delighted,

original: 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so //
analyzed: 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so //
translated: Are unable to harm, even if they try.

original: lan gcig bklags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: lan gcig bklags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur //
translated: If it is read once, one will attain the same merit as that of Great Brahmā.

original: shes rab chen po gang zhig gis //
analyzed: shes rab chen po gang zhig gis //
translated: Whoever recites this with great wisdom

original: nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas pa //
analyzed: nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas pa //
translated: the supreme mantra of the sun's rays

original: dri ma med cing rab dag la //🔽rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba yi //
analyzed: dri ma med cing rab dag la // rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba yi //
translated: will become stainless and pure,🔽very radiant, with a pleasant voice,

original: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob //
translated: and will attain a delightful abode pleasing to all beings.

original: mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing //
translated: The unequaled one, the one who generates strength, the one who goes on the supreme path, the one praised by the gods who are radiant and committed,

original: yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi //
analyzed: yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi //
translated: the one who captivates the minds of the assemblies of gods and demigods,

original: gzungs 'di rgyal pa rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: gzungs 'di rgyal pa rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin //
translated: this dhāraṇī has been well-spoken by the Victorious Ones.

original: 'phags pa 'jam @89a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam @89a *//
translated: The Noble One, Mañju

original: dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The one hundred and eight names of Mañjuśrī, along with the dhāraṇī, is complete.
